name: expo-amap
description: 在 Expo app 中使用高德地图原生SDK

scripts.build: powershell -Command "if ($env:OS -like '*Windows*') { npm run build:windows } else { expo-module build }"
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "if ($env:OS -like '*Windows*') { npm run clean:windows } else { expo-module clean }"
scripts.lint: powershell -Command "if ($env:OS -like '*Windows*') { npm run lint:windows } else { expo-module lint }"
scripts.test: powershell -Command "if ($env:OS -like '*Windows*') { npm run test:windows } else { expo-module test }"
scripts.test:windows: echo 'Windows环境下暂不支持运行测试' && exit 0
scripts.prepare: powershell -Command "if ($env:OS -like '*Windows*') { npm run prepare:windows } else { expo-module prepare }"
scripts.prepublishOnly: powershell -Command "if ($env:OS -like '*Windows*') { npm run prepublishOnly:windows } else { expo-module prepublishOnly }"
scripts.prepublishOnly:windows: echo 'Windows环境下prepublishOnly操作' && npm run build:windows

author: zhang.xin1@outlook.com <zhang.xin1@outlook.com> (https://github.com/chaochaoxiaoshu)
